participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and outgoing, Alex enjoys engaging with others and seeks to understand different perspectives.
participant_1.background: i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i just want to have fun with my friends.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and sociable, Jordan is someone who values relationships and enjoys sharing experiences through conversation.
participant_2.background: my father drove a car for nascar. my favorite color is grey. i am employed by the us postal service. i'm terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby.

content.text: I do! i have a lot of friends.
How are cars and friends connected?
I have a few. i am not sure if i could have a car.
Stop. I don't understand you. Why cannot you have cars?
I have a lot of friends. i have a lot of friends.
Why are you writing me about your friends?
I am not sure. i am a fan of writing.
